name: My Virtual Bedroom
description:
Check out my virtual bedroom! Relax in this virtual space built in Unity - its equipped with music, furniture, plants, and a few games. . Made during CSC 377 at Cal Poly SLO.

Movement Controls:
- move character: WASD or arrows
- move camera: mouse
- open/close door: "e" or mouse down
- open/close window: "e" or mouse down
- pick up crumpled paper: mouse down
- drop crumpled paper: mouse up
- throw crumpled paper: "t" (maybe "e"?)
- push/hit magnets: "e" or mouse down
- toggle radio: "e" or mouse down
